doc.title: Idol Angel Yohkoso Yohko
doc.plot: Yohko Tanaka travels to the big city because she wants to become and idol. In the train she meets Saki, who is running away from home and wants to become an actress. Together they will settle in the city and will make lots of friends, fame will knock on Yohko's door, though not so much on Saki's.
